responsibilities.CLAUDE.md: Project context and workflow instructions for Claude AI assistant
responsibilities.tsconfig.base.json: Base TypeScript configuration for the monorepo
responsibilities.apps/api: NestJS backend API server handling workspaces, AI chat, tasks, and authentication
responsibilities.apps/api/src/auth: Authentication and authorization module (JWT, Google OAuth, OTP)
responsibilities.apps/api/src/ai: AI service integration (provider factory, controllers, services)
responsibilities.apps/api/src/common: Shared utilities (filters, interceptors, pipes, logger, email service, templates)
responsibilities.apps/www/src/app: Next.js app router pages and layouts
responsibilities.apps/web/src/app: Next.js app router with auth and dashboard routes
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components: UI components - board filters, navigation, editors, modals, and layout components
responsibilities.apps/web/src/context: React context providers for global state
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks: Custom React hooks for shared logic
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk: AI SDK for agent implementation and provider abstraction
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/core: Core AI SDK (agent, compiler, context, engine, workflow)
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/workflows: Predefined AI workflows (compiling, documenting, idea, interview, query, task creation)
responsibilities.packages/sdk: Core SDK for AI agent orchestration and execution
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent: Agent implementation (artifact syncer, codebase indexer, task executor, worker)
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules: API client modules (ai, auth, ci, docs, invitations, organizations, sprints, tasks, workspaces)
responsibilities.packages/shared: Shared types, models, and utilities across packages
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models: Zod schemas and TypeScript types for domain models
responsibilities.apps/api/src/common/services/email.servi: Email service handling email sending operations
responsibilities.apps/api/src/common/templates/email-base: Base email template providing common structure for all emails
Template for one-time password verification emails
responsibilities.apps/api/src/common/templates/welcome-em: Template for new user welcome emails
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/PropertyItem.tsx: Individual property field component for displaying/editing task properties
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/task-panel/TaskP: Panel displaying all properties for a task in the task detail view
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/ui/Modal.tsx: Modal/dialog component for overlaying content on the main interface
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/ui/constants.ts: Design system constants including colors, spacing, breakpoints, and z-index values
responsibilities.package.json: Project dependencies and configuration including driver.js
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/board/BoardEmpty: Empty state UI component displayed when board has no tasks
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/board/BoardConte: Main content area component for the board view
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Component for rendering individual task cards with properties like title, status, priority, and assignee. Handles task display in board and list views.
Main board page route component that orchestrates the kanban board view
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/chat/ChatInput.t: Text input component for composing and sending chat messages
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/backlog/BulkActi: Component for performing bulk actions on multiple selected items
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/chat/ChatSidebar: Chat sidebar component for displaying and managing chat conversations in the dashboard
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/ui/Drawer.tsx: Reusable drawer/slide-out panel UI component for overlaying content
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Hook for detecting mobile viewport breakpoints
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Hook for responsive media query matching
responsibilities.apps/api/src/sprints/sprints.service.ts: Service layer for sprint CRUD operations and business logic
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/board/BoardColum: Kanban board column component for task display and drag-and-drop
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useTaskDescription.ts: Custom React hook for managing task description state and logic
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/index-node.ts: Node.js-specific SDK entry point. Exports agent system, AI clients, orchestrator, and utilities
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/ai/runner.ts: Defines the AiRunner interface contract for AI provider implementations with run, stream, and event emitter methods
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/index.ts: Barrel export file re-exporting all exec module components including context-tracker, event-emitter, events, exec-session, history-manager, and types
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display: CLI output rendering (progress, status bar, streaming)
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/display/execution-stats: Tracks and displays execution metrics like duration, token usage, and costs
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec: Execution engine for running AI-powered tasks with event-driven architecture
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/event-emitter.ts: Pub/sub event system for execution lifecycle notifications
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/events.ts: Defines typed execution event system with event types enum, event payload interfaces for session lifecycle, thinking, tools, text, and errors
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/types.ts: Defines stream chunk types and tool parameter interfaces for real-time AI output streaming including tool use, results, thinking, and errors
responsibilities.apps/web/src/views/Docs.tsx: Documentation page view component with sidebar and editor
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useDocs.ts: React hook for document management state and operations
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useDocsQuery.ts: React Query hooks for document API operations
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/cli.ts: CLI entry point and command dispatcher
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/config-manager.ts: Manages .locus directory, config files, and project initialization
responsibilities.packages/cli/src/commands: CLI command implementations (exec, init, run, index, help)
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/orchestrator.ts: Multi-agent orchestrator spawning and managing worker processes
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/agent/worker.ts: Agent worker process for task execution
Fetches documents from server for agent context
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/core/config.ts: SDK configuration constants and path utilities
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/core/prompt-builder.ts: Builds prompts for AI model interactions
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/exec-session.ts: Manages AI execution sessions with history persistence
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/exec/context-tracker.ts: Tracks artifacts and tasks within sessions
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/manifest-validat: Jest unit tests for ManifestValidatorService covering isFieldFilled, calculateCompletion, and REQUIRED_MANIFEST_FIELDS integration
responsibilities.apps/api/src/tasks/tasks.controller.ts: NestJS REST controller for task CRUD operations including list, create, update, delete, batch update, comments, and task context retrieval
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/manifest.ts: Shared Zod schemas and TypeScript types for project manifests including phases, sprints, milestones, timeline, repository context, and validation/completion result interfaces
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/constants.ts: Defines shared constants for manifest validation including required fields list and completion threshold
responsibilities.apps/api/src/config/configuration.ts: Zod-based environment configuration schema with validation for API settings (database, JWT, OAuth, CORS)
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/manifest-validat: NestJS service for validating, repairing, and calculating completion of project manifests
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/settings/Intervi: React component for toggling interview bypass feature in workspace admin settings
responsibilities.apps/web/src/app/(dashboard)/settings/pa: Next.js settings page rendering workspace, checklist, admin, and danger zone sections
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useManifestCompletion: React hook for managing manifest completion state with React Query caching and invalidation
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/workspaces.contr: NestJS REST controller handling workspace CRUD, manifest status, dispatch, interview bypass, and API key management endpoints
responsibilities.apps/web/src/lib/query-keys.ts: Centralized React Query key factory for consistent caching and invalidation across workspaces, tasks, sprints, docs, organizations, invitations, and AI sessions
responsibilities.packages/sdk/src/modules/workspaces.ts: SDK client module providing typed methods for workspace API operations including CRUD, stats, manifest status, dispatch, API keys, and interview bypass
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/settings/FieldCh: React component displaying a checklist of project manifest fields with completion status, progress tracking, and navigation callbacks
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/settings/index.t: Barrel file exporting all settings-related components including API key management, field checklist, interview bypass, project setup guide, and workspace settings
Barrel export file for interview components
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/index.ts: Central barrel export for all dashboard components including AuthLayoutUI, BoardFilter, BottomNav, Header, interview, onboarding, PageLayout, PropertyItem, Sidebar, SprintCreateModal, TaskCard, TaskCreateModal, TaskPanel, typography, and WorkspaceProtected
responsibilities.apps/web/src/lib/interview-gate-config.t: Configuration for interview gate feature, defining rules and settings for when/how interview gates are displayed
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: Main sidebar navigation component for the dashboard, handles navigation links and workspace switching
responsibilities.apps/web/src/app/(dashboard)/layout.tsx: Root layout component for dashboard routes, wraps dashboard pages with common UI elements like sidebar and header
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useInterviewAutoStart: Custom hook that automatically starts the interview onboarding flow when a new workspace redirects to /chat with interview query param
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useWorkspaceCreateFor: Custom hook for workspace creation form management with optional auto-organization creation
responsibilities.apps/web/src/lib/tour-steps.ts: Onboarding tour definitions using driver.js for dashboard, board, chat, backlog, and interview flows
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useInterviewPersisten: Manages interview chat backup to localStorage, auto-saves messages on changes and page unload, restores unsent messages
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useInterviewResumptio: Detects and manages interview resumption state, checks manifest completion, local backups, and saved sessions
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Core chat functionality hook managing sessions, messages, mutations for AI intent detection and execution, backup restoration
responsibilities.apps/web/src/lib/local-storage-keys.ts: Centralized localStorage keys registry with prefixed keys and helper functions for dynamic keys
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/interview-abando: Scheduled cron job that detects and emits events for abandoned interviews after 7 days of inactivity
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/interview-analyt: Tracks and emits analytics events for interview lifecycle (started, field completed, completed, abandoned)
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/useInterviewCompletio: React hook for managing interview completion state, celebration triggers, and automatic redirect
responsibilities.apps/web/src/lib/field-metadata.ts: Defines metadata (labels, icons, descriptions) for project manifest fields used in interview UI
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/chat/InterviewPr: Progress bar component showing interview completion status with field indicators
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/ui/Confetti.tsx: Celebration confetti animation component using canvas-confetti library
responsibilities.apps/api/src/app.module.ts: Root NestJS module configuring all application modules, guards, interceptors, and filters
responsibilities.packages/ai-sdk/src/index.ts: Exports AI SDK modules including chains, agent, context, and LLM factory
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/enums.ts: Shared enums for user roles, membership roles, task status, priority, sprint status, and event types
responsibilities.apps/api/src/ai/ai.service.ts: AI service handling chat, intent detection, session management, and state persistence with interview analytics
responsibilities.apps/api/src/entities/workspace.entity.t: TypeORM entity for workspaces with project manifest, agent state, and interview tracking columns
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/workspaces.modul: NestJS module for workspaces, providing CRUD, manifest validation, and interview analytics services
responsibilities.apps/web/src/hooks/index.ts: Barrel export for all React hooks including interview, auth, workspace, and form hooks
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/activity.ts: Zod schemas for comments, artifacts, and event payloads including interview events
Chat header component with sidebar toggle, share modal, and interview progress bar
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/chat/index.ts: Barrel export for all chat-related components
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/interview/Interv: Full-screen modal blocking access until interview is complete, showing progress and missing fields
responsibilities.apps/web/src/components/ui/index.ts: Barrel export for reusable UI components (Button, Modal, Input, etc.)
responsibilities.apps/web/src/app/(dashboard)/chat/page.t: Main chat page with interview auto-start, completion tracking, persistence, and celebration
responsibilities.apps/api/src/workspaces/workspaces.servi: NestJS injectable service handling workspace CRUD operations, manifest validation/repair, interview bypass functionality, API key management, and workspace statistics/activity retrieval
responsibilities.packages/shared/src/models/workspace.ts: Zod schemas and TypeScript types for workspace entities including ChecklistItem, Workspace, WorkspaceWithManifestInfo, request/response DTOs, and manifest status types
